text: Gwendolyne Maxine Stacy is a Marvel Comics character created by Steve Ditko. She is Peter Parker's first girlfriend in the comics. ==In other media == Bryce Dallas Howard played Stacy in Spider-Man 3, with Emma Stone playing her in both The Amazing Spider-Man and The Amazing Spider-Man 2. Hailee Steinfeld would later voice her in Spider-Man: Into the Spider-Verse. title: Gwen Stacy
